summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Gilman Avenue from Emerson Street to 23rd Avenue West et al, in the City of Seattle, by constructing a plank roadway, under Ordinance No. 12910, creating Local Improvement District No. 1143 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
